# Scenarios

## C# Example
```csharp
var thing = new MyNewControl();
thing.BeAwesome = true;
thing.Color = Color.Cornsilk;
```

## XAML Example
```xaml
<MyNewControl x:Name="thing" BeAwesome="true" Color="Cornsilk" />
```

## CSS Example
```css
MyNewControl {
     color: Cornsilk;
}
```
